PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: According to the X-ray diffraction measurement , a broad diffraction peak was observed at approximately 24.0 ° .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| X-ray diffraction |
| 24.0 ° (diffraction peak) |

Note: I have included "diffraction peak" as a property since it is a measurable characteristic of the X-ray diffraction pattern.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: According to the X-ray diffraction measurement , a broad diffraction peak was observed at approximately 24.0 ° .

Let's think step by step.

```diff
| Property Value     |
|-------------------|
| approximately 24.0 ° |
```
The "Property Value" entity in the paragraph is "approximately 24.0 °". It is the angle at which the broad diffraction peak was observed in the X-ray diffraction measurement.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

```diff
| Property Value     |
|-------------------|
| approximately 24.0 ° |
```
The only "Property Value" entity in the paragraph is "approximately 24.0 °". It is the angle at which the broad diffraction peak was observed in the X-ray diffraction measurement, which can be considered a material property. The other phrase "X-ray diffraction measurement" is a method used to measure material properties, not a property value itself.
